conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: Of course! Based on your preference for biography movies, I highly recommend "Schindler's List" and "12 Years a Slave." Both of these films are powerful and thought-provoking dramas that explore the lives of real individuals who faced immense challenges and hardships. "Schindler's List" tells the story of Oskar Schindler, a German industrialist who saves the lives of thousands of Jews during World War II, while "12 Years a Slave" follows the true story of Solomon Northup, a free Black man who is kidnapped and sold into slavery in the antebellum United States. Both films feature incredible performances from their casts and are sure to leave a lasting impression on viewers.
